thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-UK's Official Receiver Says Was Able To Safeguard Jobs Of 919 Employees Of Carillion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UK's Official Receiver Says Was Able To Safeguard Jobs Of 919 Employees Of Carillion
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - UK‘S OFFICIAL RECEIVER -
* AN UPDATE ON EMPLOYMENT WITHIN THE CARILLION GROUP‍​ * “AS PART OF THE ONGOING LIQUIDATION OF THE CARILLION, I AM PLEASED WE HAVE BEEN ABLE TO SAFEGUARD THE JOBS OF 919 EMPLOYEES ON FRIDAY”
* “MOST STAFF ARE TRANSFERRING ON EXISTING, SIMILAR TERMS”
* ”I WILL CONTINUE TO FACILITATE THIS WHEREVER POSSIBLE AS WE WORK TO FIND NEW PROVIDERS FOR CARILLION’S OTHER CONTRACTS“ ”
* “DESPITE BEST EFFORTS IT HAS NOT BEEN POSSIBLE TO SECURE THE JOBS OF 377 STAFF, WHO WILL BE MADE REDUNDANT”
* "THOSE AFFECTED WILL BE ENTITLED TO MAKE A CLAIM FOR STATUTORY REDUNDANCY PAYMENTS" Source text for Eikon: ( goo.gl/Su31KP ) Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
